citeinfo.title: Arctic and Offshore Research Information System (AORIS)

descript.abstract: There are three components to the Arctic Offshore Research Information System (AORIS): a directory that lists 85 databases containing Arctic energy-related information and how to access them; a Bibliographic/Management Information System (B/MIS) containing over 8,000 references and abstracts on energy-related research; and a hierarchical scientific and engineering information system containing over 800 data sets, in both tabular and graphical formats, on sea ice characteristics from the B/MIS citations.
descript.purpose: Create a list of 85 databases containing Arctic energy-related information and how to access them; a Bibliographic/Management Information System (B/MIS) containing over 8,000 references and abstracts on energy-related research;

cntaddr.address: Morgantown Energy Technology Center, PO BOX 880
Morgantown Energy Technology Center, PO BOX 880

NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
